  |} Special tokens used by ''[[Strife]]'' to mark completed quests. This is [[ZDoom]]'s inventory-based implementation of the {{dw|Strife quest flags}}. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR QuestItem : [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]] { States { Spawn: TOKN A -1 Stop } }
